section.title: Result
section.p: This indicates the final result of the method, which can be one of the following values:

li.p: INCOMPLETE: When at least one of the task in the request had status SUCCESS or INCOMPLETE and rest of the tasks in the request had status FAILURE, INCOMPLETE, or NOT_EXECUTED
NOT_EXECUTED: The method was not executed

section.title: ErrorInfo
section.p: The ErrorInfo contains ErrorCode, ErrorMsg and ErrorCategory.

For a successful response, the ErrorCode will be 0 and the ErrorMsg will be an empty string. For a failure response, the ErrorCode and ErrorMsg will give the failure information. ErrorCategory is usually an empty string for SurePay methods.
Two types of errors can be returned by a method:

li.p: Errors from a specific NCC method.
